name: NumericFrames 2.0
author: muf
description:
Upscaling of Numeric Animation from SD to HD with high texture retention.

A serious upgrade over 1.0. Much more universality. Can look good on both clean SD and noisy/grainy source frames. It still has a weakness against sources with strong halos and jagged edges and rainbowing. (Recommended that these issues are fixed beforehand with avisynth)
dataset: SD Numeric cartoon and anime frames and counterpart HD versions
